titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of National Save for Retirement Week.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Ms. Schwartz moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 513.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/25/2007--Passed House without amendment. Expresses support for: (1) the goals and ideals of National Save for Retirement Week; and (2) the need to raise public awareness about saving for retirement and the availability of tax-preferred employer-sponsored retirement savings plans.
